attributes.action: Reduce the amount of Council Tax that people living in the countryside pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who live in the countryside pay the same level of council tax as those who live in the towns and cities, even though the level of services they receive is significantly less.  I believe that as countryside dwellers receive less, they should pay less.  A countryside discount would be a reasonable start.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
